_meta.description: FrankX.ai Image Asset Index - tracks all images, their purpose, usage locations, and status
_meta.legalNotes: Oracle logos/trademarks require written authorization per oracle.com/legal/logos. Do NOT use Oracle red O logo or official wordmark. Text references (OCI, Oracle Database 23ai) are permitted as nominative fair use.

blog/oci-series.description: OCI Enterprise AI Architecture Series infographics

images.title: Six-Plane Enterprise AI Architecture
images.description: Main architecture diagram showing 6 planes (Experience, Ingress, Orchestration, Data, Model, Operations) with OCI service mapping
images.generatedWith: Gemini 3 Pro Image via Nano Banana MCP

images.title: Demo-to-Production Gap
images.description: Shows transformation from 1 component (demo) to 8+ components (production). Generic architecture, no vendor branding.
images.generatedWith: Gemini 3 Pro Image via Nano Banana MCP

images.title: Data & Retrieval Plane - OCI Implementation
images.description: RAG pipeline with Oracle Database 23ai vector search, document ingestion, embedding, and retrieval patterns. Includes Cohere logo.
images.generatedWith: Gemini 3 Pro Image via Nano Banana MCP

images.title: Model Plane Architecture (2026)
images.description: OCI GenAI Service model selection: Native (Cohere, Meta Llama, Oracle future, Fine-tuned) and BYOM (Mistral, Mixtral, HuggingFace). Deployment options and routing policy.
images.generatedWith: Gemini 3 Pro Image via Nano Banana MCP

images.title: Pattern Selection Framework
images.description: 3-step decision process: Characterize Workflow → Match to Pattern → Validate Constraints. Maps workflow types to 6 orchestration patterns.
images.generatedWith: Gemini 3 Pro Image via Nano Banana MCP

images.title: Six Agent Orchestration Patterns Overview
images.description: 2x3 grid showing all 6 patterns: Sequential, Concurrent, Group Chat, Handoff, Orchestrator-Worker, Human-in-the-Loop with mini-diagrams.
images.generatedWith: Gemini 3 Pro Image via Nano Banana MCP

images.title: ACOS v5.0 Architecture Pyramid
images.description: 7-layer pyramid (MCP Foundation, Skills Library, Specialist Agents, Plugin Marketplace, Model Routing, Swarm Orchestration, Creator Hub Interface) with agent hierarchy donut chart and live metrics dashboard

images.title: ACOS Venn Diagram with Stats
images.description: 3-circle Venn (Skills 70+, Agents 10, Commands 14) centered on ACOS. Bottom stats bar: 51 Articles, 500+ Tracks, 40min Idea-to-Publish

images.title: AI Motherboard Concept Art
images.description: Isometric 3D circuit board with chips labeled Claude, ChatGPT, Suno, Perplexity. Shows AI tools as hardware components on a unified platform.

images.title: Orchestrator Core with 5 Agents
images.description: 3D claymation-style render of Orchestrator Core (black) connected to 5 specialist agents: Researcher (blue), Strategist (green), Writer (blue), QA Critic (orange), Media Gen (orange). Shows data flow tubes between agents.

blog/svgs.description: SVG diagrams for blog articles (older, pre-infographic era)
blog/svgs.note: Legacy SVG diagrams. Consider replacing with infographics or MDX components where used.

3d.note: 3D premium icons used across site for visual accent

team.note: Includes archive versions. AI team characters.

brands.note: Used on homepage/partner sections. Check trademark compliance.
